glsa.title: mujs: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in mujs, the worst of which could result in a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: mujs is an embeddable Javascript interpreter in C.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in mujs. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All mujs users should upgrade to the latest version:
